page-not-found.content2: , is not a correct one. Please try with other path.

simulacrum.l1: Find a quiet place without distractions to concentrate.
simulacrum.l2: Make sure you have enough uninterrupted time.
simulacrum.l3: Have the necessary technical material at hand.
simulacrum.l4: Maintain a positive and confident attitude.
simulacrum.l5: Read all the instructions carefully before starting each exercise.
simulacrum.l6: Use your time wisely and manage time limits if there are any.
simulacrum.l7: Perform prior connection tests if it's a remote interview.
simulacrum.l9: Accept challenges as opportunities to learn.
simulacrum.l11: Reflect on your performance after the simulacrum.
simulacrum.title: Simulacrum of interviews

benefits.limited_access: Limited access to frequently asked questions in select interviews
benefits.intro_tutorials: Introductory tutorials on common interview topics

benefits.full_access: Full access to frequently asked interview questions
Full access to all frequently asked interview questions
